title: Set alias for columns in data set not reflected correctly in expression builder
description: When setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the newly set aliases.
EB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the aliases should be displayed for the columns instead of the old names.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. The old column names instead of the aliases are displayed.
